form_validation.form_validation_isset: The {field} field must have a value.
form_validation.form_validation_valid_email: The {field} field must contain a valid email address.
form_validation.form_validation_valid_emails: The {field} field must contain all valid email addresses.
form_validation.form_validation_valid_url: The {field} field must contain a valid URL.
form_validation.form_validation_valid_ip: The {field} field must contain a valid IP.
form_validation.form_validation_min_length: The {field} field must be at least {param} characters in length.
form_validation.form_validation_max_length: The {field} field cannot exceed {param} characters in length.
form_validation.form_validation_exact_length: The {field} field must be exactly {param} characters in length.
form_validation.form_validation_alpha: The {field} field may only contain alphabetical characters.
form_validation.form_validation_alpha_numeric: The {field} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters.
form_validation.form_validation_alpha_numeric_spaces: The {field} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters and spaces.
form_validation.form_validation_alpha_dash: The {field} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters, underscores, and dashes.
form_validation.form_validation_numeric: The {field} field must contain only numbers.
form_validation.form_validation_is_numeric: The {field} field must contain only numeric characters.
form_validation.form_validation_integer: The {field} field must contain an integer.
form_validation.form_validation_regex_match: The {field} field is not in the correct format.
form_validation.form_validation_matches: The {field} field does not match the {param} field.
form_validation.form_validation_differs: The {field} field must differ from the {param} field.
form_validation.form_validation_is_unique: The {field} field must contain a unique value.
form_validation.form_validation_is_natural: The {field} field must only contain digits.
form_validation.form_validation_is_natural_no_zero: The {field} field must only contain digits and must be greater than zero.
form_validation.form_validation_decimal: The {field} field must contain a decimal number.
form_validation.form_validation_less_than: The {field} field must contain a number less than {param}.
form_validation.form_validation_less_than_equal_to: The {field} field must contain a number less than or equal to {param}.
form_validation.form_validation_greater_than: The {field} field must contain a number greater than {param}.
form_validation.form_validation_greater_than_equal_to: The {field} field must contain a number greater than or equal to {param}.
form_validation.form_validation_error_message_not_set: Unable to access an error message corresponding to your field name {field}.
form_validation.form_validation_in_list: The {field} field must be one of: {param}.
